channel.title: CVE Feed for afragen -- Embed PDF Viewer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for afragen -- Embed PDF Viewer

item.title: CVE-2024-9451|2024-10-09T12:47:09.229Z -- afragen -- embed%20pdf%20viewer
item.description: The Embed PDF Viewer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'height' and 'width' parameters in all versions up to, and including, 2.4.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
